trans-unit.source: Represents the <xref uid="langword_csharp_<EncryptedKey>" name="<EncryptedKey>" href=""></xref> element in XML encryption.
trans-unit.target: Representa o <xref uid="langword_csharp_<EncryptedKey>" name="<EncryptedKey>" href=""> </xref> elemento na encriptação de XML.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Esta classe não pode ser herdada.

trans-unit.source: This class represents the `<EncryptedKey>` element in XML encryption.
trans-unit.target: Esta classe representa o `<EncryptedKey>` elemento na encriptação de XML.

trans-unit.source: The `<EncryptedKey>` element is used to send encryption keys.
trans-unit.target: O `<EncryptedKey>` elemento é utilizado para enviar as chaves de encriptação.

trans-unit.source: It can be created in a stand-alone XML document, be placed within an application document, or be inside an `<EncryptedData>` element as a child of a `<KeyInfo>` element.
trans-unit.target: Pode ser criado num documento XML autónomo, ser colocado dentro de um documento de aplicação ou estar no interior de um `<EncryptedData>` elemento como subordinado de um `<KeyInfo>` elemento.

trans-unit.source: The key value is always encrypted to the recipient.
trans-unit.target: O valor de chave é sempre encriptado para o destinatário.

trans-unit.source: When `<EncryptedKey>` is decrypted, the resulting key is made available to the `<EncryptionMethod>` algorithm without any additional processing.
trans-unit.target: Quando `<EncryptedKey>` é desencriptado, a chave resultante é disponibilizada para o `<EncryptionMethod>` algoritmo sem qualquer processamento adicional.

trans-unit.source: The `<EncryptedKey>` element is similar to the `<EncryptedData>` element of the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedData> class except that the data encrypted is always a key value.
trans-unit.target: O `<EncryptedKey>` elemento é semelhante de `<EncryptedData>` elemento do <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedData>classe exceto que os dados encriptados são sempre um valor de chave.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedData>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: This constructor creates a new instance of the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey> class.
trans-unit.target: Este construtor cria uma nova instância de <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey>classe.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey>

trans-unit.source: For more information on XML encryption standards, see the XML Encryption Syntax and Processing document at http://www.w3.org/TR/xmlenc-core/.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre as normas de encriptação de XML, consulte o documento XML encriptação sintaxe e o processamento em http://www.w3.org/TR/xmlenc-core/.

trans-unit.source: Adds a <xref uid="langword_csharp_<DataReference> " name="<DataReference> " href=""></xref>element to the <xref uid="langword_csharp_<ReferenceList>" name="<ReferenceList>" href=""></xref> element.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona um <xref uid="langword_csharp_<DataReference> " name="<DataReference> " href=""> </xref>elemento para que o <xref uid="langword_csharp_<ReferenceList>" name="<ReferenceList>" href=""> </xref> elemento.

trans-unit.source: This method adds a <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.DataReference> object to the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey.ReferenceList%2A> property of the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey> object.
trans-unit.target: Este método adiciona um <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.DataReference>de objeto para o <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey.ReferenceList%2A>propriedade o <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey>objeto.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey.ReferenceList%2A> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.DataReference>

trans-unit.source: The `<DataReference>` element points to encrypted data that was encrypted using the key specified in the `<EncryptedKey>` element.
trans-unit.target: O `<DataReference>` elemento aponta para os dados encriptados que foi encriptados com a chave especificada no `<EncryptedKey>` elemento.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.DataReference"></xref> object to add to the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey.ReferenceList*> property.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.DataReference"> </xref> o objeto a adicionar o <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey.ReferenceList*>propriedade.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey.ReferenceList*>

trans-unit.source: Adds a <xref uid="langword_csharp_<KeyReference> " name="<KeyReference> " href=""></xref>element to the <xref uid="langword_csharp_<ReferenceList>" name="<ReferenceList>" href=""></xref> element.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona um <xref uid="langword_csharp_<KeyReference> " name="<KeyReference> " href=""> </xref>elemento para que o <xref uid="langword_csharp_<ReferenceList>" name="<ReferenceList>" href=""> </xref> elemento.

trans-unit.source: This method adds A <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyReference> object to the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey.ReferenceList%2A> property of the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey> object.
trans-unit.target: Este método adiciona A <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyReference>de objeto para o <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey.ReferenceList%2A>propriedade o <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey>objeto.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey.ReferenceList%2A> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyReference>

trans-unit.source: The `<KeyReference>` element points to an encrypted key that was encrypted using the key specified in the `<EncryptedKey>` element.
trans-unit.target: O `<KeyReference>` elemento aponta para uma chave encriptada que foi encriptada com a chave especificada no `<EncryptedKey>` elemento.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyReference"></xref> object to add to the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey.ReferenceList*> property.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyReference"> </xref> o objeto a adicionar o <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey.ReferenceList*>propriedade.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey.ReferenceList*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the optional <xref uid="langword_csharp_<CarriedKeyName>" name="<CarriedKeyName>" href=""></xref> element in XML encryption.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o opcional <xref uid="langword_csharp_<CarriedKeyName>" name="<CarriedKeyName>" href=""> </xref> elemento na encriptação de XML.

trans-unit.source: The `<CarriedKeyName>` element is an optional element that associates a user-readable name with a key value.
trans-unit.target: O `<CarriedKeyName>` elemento é um elemento opcional que associa um nome de utilizador legível com um valor de chave.

trans-unit.source: This name can then be used to reference the key using the `<KeyName>` element within the `<KeyInfo>` element.
trans-unit.target: Este nome, em seguida, pode ser utilizado para referenciar a chave utilizando o `<KeyName>` elemento o `<KeyInfo>` elemento.

trans-unit.source: The same `<CarriedKeyName>` element value, unlike an ID value, can occur multiple times within a single document.
trans-unit.target: O mesmo `<CarriedKeyName>` o valor do elemento, ao contrário de um valor de ID, pode ocorrer várias vezes dentro de um único documento.

trans-unit.source: The value of the key must be the same in all `<EncryptedKey>` elements identified with the same `<CarriedKeyName>` name within an XML document.
trans-unit.target: O valor da chave tem de ser igual em todos os `<EncryptedKey>` elementos identificados com o mesmo `<CarriedKeyName>` nome dentro de um documento XML.

trans-unit.source: Note that because white space is significant in the value of the `<KeyName>` element, white space is also significant in the value of the `<CarriedKeyName>` element.
trans-unit.target: Tenha em atenção que porque significativo no valor de espaço em branco a `<KeyName>` elemento, o espaço em branco também é significativo no valor do `<CarriedKeyName>` elemento.

trans-unit.source: A string that represents a name for the key value.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia que representa um nome para o valor da chave.

trans-unit.source: Returns the XML representation of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Devolve a representação XML do <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: Use this method to output the `<EncryptedKey>` element in XML.
trans-unit.target: Utilize este método para a saída de `<EncryptedKey>` elemento no ficheiro XML.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Xml.XmlElement"></xref> that represents the <xref uid="langword_csharp_<EncryptedKey>" name="<EncryptedKey>" href=""></xref> element in XML encryption.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Xml.XmlElement"> </xref> que representa o <xref uid="langword_csharp_<EncryptedKey>" name="<EncryptedKey>" href=""> </xref> elemento na encriptação de XML.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey"></xref> value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: The <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey"></xref> value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Loads the specified XML information into the <xref uid="langword_csharp_<EncryptedKey>" name="<EncryptedKey>" href=""></xref> element in XML encryption.
trans-unit.target: Carrega as informações de XML especificada para o <xref uid="langword_csharp_<EncryptedKey>" name="<EncryptedKey>" href=""> </xref> elemento na encriptação de XML.

trans-unit.source: Use this method to load an existing XML element into the `<EncryptedKey>` element represented by the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedData> object.
trans-unit.target: Utilize este método para carregar um elemento XML existente para o `<EncryptedKey>` elemento um representado pelo <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedData>objeto.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedData>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Xml.XmlElement"></xref> representing an XML element to use for the <xref uid="langword_csharp_<EncryptedKey>" name="<EncryptedKey>" href=""></xref> element.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Xml.XmlElement"> </xref> que representa um elemento XML a utilizar para o <xref uid="langword_csharp_<EncryptedKey>" name="<EncryptedKey>" href=""> </xref> elemento.

trans-unit.source: The value parameter is .
trans-unit.target: The value parameter is .

trans-unit.source: The value parameter does not contain a element.
trans-unit.target: O value parâmetro não contém um elemento.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the optional <xref uid="langword_csharp_Recipient" name="Recipient" href=""></xref> attribute in XML encryption.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o opcional <xref uid="langword_csharp_Recipient" name="Recipient" href=""> </xref> atributo na encriptação de XML.

trans-unit.source: The `<Recipient>` attribute is an optional attribute that contains information about which recipient this encrypted key value is intended for.
trans-unit.target: O `<Recipient>` atributo é um atributo opcional que contém informações sobre o destinatário este valor de chave encriptado destina-se.

trans-unit.source: Its contents are application dependent.
trans-unit.target: O seu conteúdo é aplicações dependentes.

trans-unit.source: A string representing the value of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_Recipient" name="Recipient" href=""></xref> attribute.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia representando o valor da <xref uid="langword_csharp_Recipient" name="Recipient" href=""> </xref> atributo.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref uid="langword_csharp_<ReferenceList>" name="<ReferenceList>" href=""></xref> element in XML encryption.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o <xref uid="langword_csharp_<ReferenceList>" name="<ReferenceList>" href=""> </xref> elemento na encriptação de XML.

trans-unit.source: The `<ReferenceList>` element is an optional element that contains pointers to data and keys encrypted using this key.
trans-unit.target: O `<ReferenceList>` elemento é um elemento opcional que contém indicações para dados e chaves encriptadas utilizando esta chave.

trans-unit.source: The reference list can contain multiple references to the `<EncryptedKey>`and `<EncryptedData>` elements using the `<KeyReference>` and `<DataReference>` elements respectively.
trans-unit.target: A lista de referência pode conter várias referências à `<EncryptedKey>`e `<EncryptedData>` elementos utilizando o `<KeyReference>` e `<DataReference>` elementos, respetivamente.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.ReferenceList"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.ReferenceList"></xref> object.
